title: He, Haditcummin
description: Lord & Lady Ownalott are hosting their annual soiree, one dark and stormy night, inviting neighbours, Mr & Mrs Fortune, and the local clergyman, Reverend Churcher, for dinner. However, the guests get more than they bargained for when one of them ends up dead...A hilarious, light-hearted, fast-paced stage play which gently pokes fun at the classic "whodunnit" format.
author: Jo  Smith
